name: GitHub Webhook 署名検証 最小
description: X-Hub-Signature-256 を HMACで検証する最小例

files.template:
import crypto from 'node:crypto';
export function verify(signature, secret, body){ const h = 'sha256=' + crypto.createHmac('sha256', secret).update(body).digest('hex'); return crypto.timingSafeEqual(Buffer.from(h), Buffer.from(signature)); }
